attributes.action: stop the Home Secretary claiming expenses for the maintenance of a second home while the taxpayer funds a grace and favour residence for her use.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is wrong for the taxpayer to fund a grace and favour residence for the use of the Home Secretary AND pay for the maintenance of her nominated second residence. The taxpayer is paying twice and this is extravagance that can be done without.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
